trans-unit.source: Defines the condition definition behind a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference" />.
trans-unit.target: 定義 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference" /> 背後的條件定義。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition> class defines the base conditions evaluated when a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> is executed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition> 類別會定義執行 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> 時所評估的基底條件。

trans-unit.source: This condition type is modeled with CodeDom types.
trans-unit.target: 這個條件型別的模型是使用 CodeDom 型別所建立的。

trans-unit.source: For more information about CodeDom types, see [CodeDOM Types Supported by Windows Workflow Foundation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0381740f-0a29-43ae-96e2-17e14e832083).
trans-unit.target: 如需 CodeDom 型別的詳細資訊，請參閱[CodeDOM 型別支援 Windows Workflow Foundation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0381740f-0a29-43ae-96e2-17e14e832083)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> to initialize the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> with.
trans-unit.target: 用來初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> class by using a specified code expression.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的程式碼運算式，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the condition to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 要評估的條件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> class by using a specified name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="conditionName" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="conditionName" /> 為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: The name of the condition to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 要評估的條件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> to initialize the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> with.
trans-unit.target: 用來初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> class by using a specified name and code expression.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的名稱和程式碼運算式，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 建立目前 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> 的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: 與這個執行個體完全相同的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to compare with the current object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前物件比較的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two object instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 判斷兩個物件執行個體是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object instances are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件執行個體相等，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Instance of the runtime context that <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> is running in.
trans-unit.target: 執行階段內容的執行個體，正在執行 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" />。

trans-unit.source: Evaluates the expression.
trans-unit.target: 評估運算式。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the expression evaluates to true; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果運算式評估為 true，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression condition to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要評估的運算式條件。

trans-unit.source: The expression condition to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 要評估的運算式條件。

trans-unit.source: The activity running the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> is runtime initialized.
trans-unit.target: 執行 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 的活動是初始化的執行階段。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: 管理驗證程序的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the dependencies for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> 的相依性。

trans-unit.source: A list of dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 相依性清單。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體的雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the condition to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要評估的條件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the condition to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: 要評估的條件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The activity running the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> is runtime initialized.
trans-unit.target: 執行 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet" /> 的活動是初始化的執行階段。

trans-unit.source: Called when all properties have been given values.
trans-unit.target: 當所有屬性已有指定的值時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: After this call, no properties can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫後，就無法修改任何屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns the string value of the expression condition.
trans-unit.target: 傳回運算式條件的字串值。

trans-unit.source: The string value of the expression condition.
trans-unit.target: 運算式條件的字串值。

trans-unit.source: An empty string if the expression condition is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果運算式條件為 <see langword="null" />，則為空字串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: 管理驗證程序的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" />。

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the expression is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: 驗證運算式已正確設定，而且沒有任何錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the expression has no errors; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果運算式沒有錯誤，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition> contains errors (the `Validate` method returns `false`), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> will contain the list of errors encountered.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition> 包含錯誤 (`Validate` 方法傳回 `false`)，則 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 將會包含所遭遇之錯誤的清單。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="validator" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="validator" /> 為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 <see langword="Nothing" />)。
